system.effect: Whenever the character deals Critical Damage to an opponent, they can make a +0 Intelligence Test. If they suceed, they can reduce the damage they inflict by up to their Intelligence Bonus and inflict 1 Fatigue on the Target for each degree of success they scored on the Test. They also gain +30 to Medicae Skill Tests to treat wounds that they caused.
